name: IBYH!?
description:
IBYH!?

IBYH!? (If Bad, Y Hot!?) is a WarioWare like title where you must play as a group of criminals on the run. Your mission is to steal from the rich and give to the poor. They must try to help as many people as they can until their luck runs out. Made in Unity for Ludum Dare 50: Delay The Inevitable.

Controls

a/d - Movement

w/space - Jump

s/shift - Special

Credits

Programmer: https://twitter.com/trabasura

Narrative Designer/Writer: https://twitter.com/Potato_Mika

Character Designer/Artist: https://twitter.com/Ariisataco

Music:
